entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 18 January 2023
